message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40!
Your split is a good starting point, but how about we meet a little closer to the middle? This offer accounts for the time value of money with the inflation working against you.
I see you're willing to compromise, let's meet at 58-42 and call it a day.
I appreciate you negotiating, but your previous offer isn't quite appealing enough yet. This offer is a good balance given the decreasing value of the money over time.
I'm willing to compromise further, but I still think I deserve a bit more than half. Let's try 57-43.
Alice, let's be real. The clock is ticking and the value is decreasing. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical option at this point.
